Back To Recipes

Clean counter space:

Empty dishwasher
Load dishwasher
Put away anything not related to recipe away

Get out the following ingredients:

Boneless Rib Club Steak
Black Pepper
Salt

Recipe

Open the package with Boneless Rib Club Steak
Season both sides with Black Pepper and Salt
Put pan on heat 8 to preheat for 3 minutes
Wait 30 seconds Put steak in preheated pan
Wait 30 seconds Flip steak in pan
Wait 4 minutes Put steak in airfryer @ 370 deg
Flip steak
Wait 3 minutes Put steak in airfryer @ 370 deg until correct temperature
